sentences.en: He viewed them with the manner of a fatherly pilot, his countenance radiant with benevolence.
sentences.cn: 他像一位慈父般的领航员那样望着他们，脸上泛着慈祥的光彩。

sentences.en: Benevolence can never be measured in money.
sentences.cn: 善举绝不应该用金钱衡量。

sentences.en: The true source of cheerfulness is benevolence.
sentences.cn: 快乐的真正源泉是行善。
